description: Sends an Amazon Macie membership invitation to one or more accounts.

parameters.name: accountIds
parameters.description: An array that lists Amazon Web Services account IDs, one for each account to send the invitation to. (string) ---

nested_items.name: unprocessedAccounts
nested_items.description: An array of objects, one for each account whose invitation hasn't been processed. Each object identifies the account and explains why the invitation hasn't been processed for the account.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID for the account that the request applies to.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The source of the issue or delay in processing the request.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The reason why the request hasn't been processed.
